Synopsis: 
The action takes place in the 60's, the early space age and a time filled with the feeling of hope for the Camelot of JFK. But it was the height of the Cold War, when rising tensions between the U.S. and the Soviet Union threatened the entire planet, and when the world discovered the existence of mutants. 

It is during this period that Charles Xavier meets Erik Lehnsherr. Before Charles (James McAvoy) and Erik (Michael Fassbender) take the names of Professor X and Magneto, two youths were in the process of discovering his powers. Prior to his arch enemies, were the closest friends, working together and with other mutants to stop the biggest threat the world had ever known. 

Production notes: 
The film is the film adaptation of Marvel comic book series of the same title, released in 2006.
